channel.title: Profile Model on OSCAL
channel.description: Recent content in Profile Model on OSCAL

item.title: Profile JSON Model Map
Profile JSON Schema Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_profile_schema.json Schema version 1.0.0-milestone2 Short name oscal-profile A profile designates a selection and configuration of controls from one or more catalogs, along with a series of operations over them. The topmost element in the OSCAL profile XML schema is profile. Switch to XML add Name Addition Description Specifies contents to be added into controls, in resolution This object appears as a property on: alter. The add object has the following members (properties):

item.title: Profile XML Model Map
item.description: + <profile id="string"> [1]… </profile> - <profile id="string"> [1] + <metadata> [1]… </metadata> - <metadata> [1] <title>markup-line</title> [1] <published>dateTime-with-timezone</published> [0 or 1] <last-modified>dateTime-with-timezone</last-modified> [1] <version>string</version> [1] <oscal-version>string</oscal-version> [1] <doc-id type="string">string</doc-id> [0 to ∞] <prop name="NCName" id="string" ns="string" class="NCName">string</prop> [0 to ∞] <link href="uri-reference" rel="NCName" media-type="string">markup-line</link> [0 to ∞] + <role id="string"> [0 to ∞]… </role> - <role id="string"> [0 to ∞] <title>markup-line</title> [1] <short-name>string</short-name> [0 or 1]

item.title: Profile XML Schema Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_profile_schema.xsd Schema version 1.0.0-milestone2 Short name oscal-profile XML namespace http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0 A profile designates a selection and configuration of controls from one or more catalogs, along with a series of operations over them. The topmost element in the OSCAL profile XML schema is profile. Switch to JSON add Name Addition Description Specifies contents to be added into controls, in resolution This element appears inside: alter. The add element has the following contents (in order):

item.title: Profile Examples
item.description: The following OSCAL Profile model examples are provided. NIST SP 800-53 Revision 4 Baselines The NIST HIGH, MODERATE and LOW baselines for the SP800-53 rev4 catalog are available in our GitHub repository: HIGH MODERATE LOW There are also JSON and YAML versions of the NIST SP 800-53 rev4 profiles. FedRAMP Baselines Also find examples representing the FedRAMP baselines (again for the HIGH, MODERATE and LOW impact levels) on our web site.
